    private class IPojoFactory.UniquenessNameGenerator

implements IPojoFactory.NameGenerator
    This generator ensure that the returned name is globally unique.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public String generate(String name,
              String version)
                throws UnacceptableConfiguration
        This method has to be synchronized to ensure name uniqueness.
        Specified by:
        generate in interface IPojoFactory.NameGenerator
        Parameters:
        name - The user provided name (may be null)
        version - the factory version if set. Instances can specify the version of the factory they are bound to. This parameter may be used to avoid name conflicts.
        Returns:
        a unique name.
        Throws:
        UnacceptableConfiguration
